detail_desc: Ankle boots in imitation suede. Faux fur linings and insoles and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) soles.
Sleeveless satin top with a draped neckline and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Hairbands in stretch cotton jersey with a sewn-on bow at the front.
Padded earmuffs in velour with embroidery and appliqués.
Top in sturdy jersey with a wrapover funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and patch front pockets.
Straight-cut, calf-length dress in sturdy jersey with narrow shoulder straps and slits in the sides.

Sporty jacket in sturdy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem.
Pull-on trousers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with gathers below the knees and a zip at the hems.
Shorts in stretch, denim-look jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Longer hooded top in soft fleece with appliqués and embroidery. Long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft and fluffy inside.
Lightweight jacket in mesh with dangling sequins. No fasteners. Jersey lining.
Imitation leather sandals with adjustable straps with a hook and loop fastening, and a loop at the back. Moulded imitation leather insoles and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Faux fur slippers with soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Heavy waist belt made of two metal chains with various pendants at the front. Adjustable carabiner hook fastening.
Brogues with a decorative welt seam around the soles, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Trousers in a softly draping Tencel™ lyocell and silk weave with wide, covered elastication at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Cropped, boxy-style T-shirt in pima cotton jersey. Round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.

Nursing blouse in woven fabric with lace details, pin-tucks at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Double-layered with an inner top for easier nursing access.
High-waisted twill suit trousers in a wool blend with a zip fly, hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Close-fitting over the hips with wide, straight legs with creases.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with elastication at the back of the waist and pleats at the front. Zip fly and button, side pockets, a low crotch and wide, gently tapered legs.
Airy top in soft modal jersey with a low-cut back and long sleeves.
Long jacket in jersey with narrow notch lapels and patch front pockets. Unlined.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. No buttons.

Blouse in a crinkled cotton weave with a unique nursing feature. Round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a velvety finish. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, a pile-lined stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Drawstring at the waist, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and a single back vent. Quilted lining.
Trousers in a soft, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Short dress in sturdy jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front and long sleeves. Seam with a tie belt at the waist and an asymmetric skirt with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Metal hair clips with a shiny finish.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with a brushed finish. V-neck, large buttons down the front and long raglan sleeves.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, straight legs.

Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in a soft viscose weave. Shirt with a rounded collar, buttons down the front, long, cuffed sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Jumper in a textured cotton knit containing some merino wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif and lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Six ear cuffs in various designs. Two with pearly plastic beads, two in metal decorated with plastic beads and two in metal decorated with sparkly glass stones. Can be worn on non-pierced ears. Size 1.3 cm.
Wide hairband in cotton jersey with a twisted detail.

Short, fitted, double-breasted dress in woven fabric with a deep V-neck and lapels. Long sleeves, flap welt front pockets, covered buttons at the front and a concealed safety button at the hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved linen shirt with a grandad collar, classic front, yoke at the back and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Straight fit with a rounded hem.
Dungaree dress in soft cotton corduroy with adjustable straps that cross at the back and a seam at the waist with covered elastication at the back.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a print motif at the top, long sleeves and a longer layer in woven fabric at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Joggers in washed, organic cotton denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly with decorative buttons, and side pockets.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif. Short slits in the sides and slightly longer at the back.
Treggings in sturdy cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft knit with a wide foldover at the top, wide, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Handbag in shimmering metallic imitation leather with a glittery front and back. Two handles and a zip at the top. Lined. Size 4x11.5x16 cm.
Long cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket stretch cotton twill trousers in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.

Briefs in ribbed jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Low waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back. The polyamide content of the briefs is partly recycled.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, zipped side pockets and an inner pocket with a press-stud. Ribbing at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a sequined motif on the front. Long sleeves, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline, an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, and long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Relaxed fit with a gathered seam at the waist and tiers to the hem. Unlined.
Long jacket in soft viscose twill with notch lapels, flap welt front pockets, a gently tapered waist and long sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Striped leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Knee-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a wide, elasticated neckline and short, elasticated sleeves. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a seam with wide flounces at the hem. Unlined.
Balconette bra in lace and mesh with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fitted top in a rib-knit viscose blend with a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Padded jacket with a detachable, padded, lined hood, high collar, zip down the front and side pockets . Lined.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Fitted top in a fine rib knit with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Short-sleeved top in a viscose weave with a round neckline with beaded appliques, and an opening and concealed fastening at the back of the neck.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, short, double-layered flounced sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Oversized, straight-cut jacket in twill made from a linen blend. Collar, notch lapels, buttons at the front, low dropped shoulders and large patch front pockets. Satin lining.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and picot trims at the top.
Sports trousers in nylon with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and one welt back pocket. Legs with elastication and a zip at the hems. Reflective details.

Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a turn-down collar, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with a tab and button and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Lightly padded all-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with press-studs down the front that continue down one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Polyester padding.
Dress in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist, a detachable belt with a covered metal buckle and a flared skirt.
